title: the ult that kindred deserves
body:
i suggest that when kindred ults an untargetable wolfs is released from where kindred stands and follows the targeted champion gaining speed if the target walks away from kindred. there will be an area around kindred where the wolf cant attack

the wolf will gain damage as the targets hp gets lower making it a kind of executiom abilitie.

this way the target has to take a decision. face lamb and fight for their life or run like a coward and try to scape from wolf outrunning him.

this ult fits way better lorewise having in mind kindred does not save lifes, but they give their prey the choose of acepting their death to lamb or try to run away and be brutally hunted by wolf

replies.body: Should just be her new E after the slow

It sounds much more fitting and I like it, but that will leave out one of Kindred's defense tools.  It/they would become extremely vulnerable.  I'm completely fine with that, but idk if the Kindred players would be.
They could easily tune up the rest of her kit to make it more defensive. An ult like this would open up so many options for the rest of her kit to be more utility focused.

i think something along the lines of scaling damage based on distance FROM lamb would be interesting, with targeted execute, but that already sounds so much like her E :,(

maybe it only works on those who are marked?
that sounds super cool and way more useful and fitting for kindred!
its a good idea and fits more with her lore

The problem with interesting characters and ideas such as yours is that she wouldn't be offering anything in team fights since she already has that one on one pllaystyle already.

But the idea is good regardless.
Hey, that's pretty good. I really like it.
